organizationName.label: Legal Business Name
organizationName.description: The business's legal name as it appears on government forms and business paperwork
organizationName.tooltip: Must match exactly with your business registration documents

validation.format: Business name can only contain letters, numbers, and the following special characters: ()_/&+%@#;,.: -?
validation.pattern: Invalid business name format. Please use only allowed characters
validation.minLength: Business name must be at least 2 characters
validation.maxLength: Business name must be at most 100 characters
validation.noLeadingSpace: Business name cannot start with a space
validation.noTrailingSpace: Business name cannot end with a space
validation.noConsecutiveSpaces: Business name cannot contain consecutive spaces
validation.noSpecialAtStart: Business name cannot start with a special character
validation.noSpecialAtEnd: Business name cannot end with a special character

organizationDescription.label: Business Description
organizationDescription.tooltip: The business's legal name. It is the official name of the person or entity that owns a company. Must be the name used on the legal party's government forms and business paperwork.

validation.maxLength: Business description must be 500 characters or less
validation.minLength: Business description must be at least 10 characters
validation.noHtml: Business description cannot contain HTML tags

dbaName.label: Doing Business As (DBA) Name
dbaName.description: An alternate name that the business is doing business under. Provide this if your business is registered with an alias.
dbaName.tooltip: The DBA name must match your business registration documents.

validation.maxLength: DBA name must be 100 characters or less
validation.format: DBA name can only contain letters, numbers, and the following special characters: ()_/&+%@#;,.: -?
validation.pattern: Invalid DBA name format. Please use only allowed characters
validation.noLeadingSpace: DBA name cannot start with a space
validation.noTrailingSpace: DBA name cannot end with a space
validation.noConsecutiveSpaces: DBA name cannot contain consecutive spaces
validation.minLength: DBA name must be at least 2 characters

organizationType.label: Business Type
organizationType.description: Please select the most appropriate NAICS code, ensuring it accurately represents your business activity and avoiding similar but less relevant codes.

validation.format: Email must be in a valid business email format
validation.maxLength: Email must be at most 100 characters
validation.noPersonal: Please use a business email address (no gmail.com, yahoo.com, etc.)

validation.format: Email must be in a valid business email format
validation.maxLength: Email must be at most 100 characters
validation.noPersonal: Please use a business email address (no gmail.com, yahoo.com, etc.)

countryOfFormation.label: Country of Formation
countryOfFormation.tooltip: Country code in ISO alpha-2 format

validation.exactlyTwoChars: Country code must be exactly 2 characters

validation.min: Year of formation cannot be before 1800
validation.max: Year of formation cannot be in the future
validation.invalid: Please enter a valid year between 1800 and current year

validation.required: At least one government ID is required
validation.uniqueTypes: Each ID type must be unique

idType.label: ID type
idType.tooltip: should match your individual ID type

description.label: Description
description.tooltip: should match your business registration documents ID description

validation.maxLength: Description must be 100 characters or less

value.label: ID value
value.tooltip: should match your individual ID number

validation.itinFormat: ITIN must be exactly 9 digits and start with 9

expiryDate.label: Expiry date
expiryDate.description: Date when the individual ID expires
expiryDate.tooltip: Date when the individual ID expires

validation.format: Expiry date must be in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format
validation.past: Expiry date cannot be in the past
validation.tooFar: Expiry date cannot be more than 10 years in the future

issuer.label: Issuer
issuer.tooltip: should match your business registration documents ID issuer

validation.exactlyTwoChars: Issuer must be a 2-letter country code

countryOfResidence.label: Country of residence
countryOfResidence.description: The country where this individual resides

validation.exactlyTwoChars: Country code must be exactly 2 characters

jobTitleDescription.label: Job title description
jobTitleDescription.description: Brief description of your role and responsibilities

validation.maxLength: Description must be at most 50 characters
validation.pattern: Description can only contain letters, numbers, and basic punctuation

addressLines.label: Address lines
addressLines.description: Address lines of your business address

validation.pattern: Postal code must be exactly 5 digits

validation.minAddresses: At least one address is required

industryCategory.label: Industry type
industryCategory.description: Your business industry - search for the relevant industry type or the NAICS code.
industryCategory.tooltip: should match your business registration documents NAICS code

validation.maxLength: Industry category must be 100 characters or less
validation.format: Industry category can only contain letters, numbers, and basic punctuation
validation.minLength: Industry category must be at least 3 characters

industryType.description: Your business industry - search for the relevant industry type/category or the NAICS code.
industryType.tooltip: should match your business registration documents NAICS code

validation.maxLength: Industry type must be 100 characters or less
validation.format: Industry type can only contain letters, numbers, and basic punctuation
validation.minLength: Industry type must be at least 3 characters

validation.minIds: At least one organization ID is required
validation.uniqueTypes: Each organization ID type must be unique

idType.tooltip: should match your business registration documents ID type

description.tooltip: should match your business registration documents ID description

validation.business_registration_numberFormat: Business Registration Number must be 6-15 alphanumeric characters with optional dashes

expiryDate.label: Expiry date

validation.future: Expiry date must be in the future
validation.maxYears: Expiry date must be less than 10 years in the future

validation.maxLength: Website URL must be 500 characters or less
validation.httpsRequired: Website URL must start with https://
validation.format: Website must be a valid URL (e.g., https://www.example.com)
validation.noIp: Website URL cannot be an IP address

validation.format: MCC must be empty or exactly 4 digits
validation.required: MCC code is required for this business type
validation.range: MCC must be a valid code between 0001 and 9999

validation.pattern: Name can only contain letters, hyphens, apostrophes, and spaces
validation.noSpecialChars: Name cannot contain special characters except hyphens and apostrophes
validation.noLeadingSpace: Name cannot start with a space
validation.noTrailingSpace: Name cannot end with a space
validation.noLeadingHyphen: Name cannot start with a hyphen
validation.noTrailingHyphen: Name cannot end with a hyphen

validation.required: At least one address is required
validation.uniqueTypes: Each address type must be unique

validation.maxLength: Address line must be 60 characters or less
validation.minLines: At least one address line is required
validation.firstLine: First line must not be a PO Box and must begin with a number
validation.pattern: Address can only contain letters, numbers, and basic punctuation

validation.maxLength: City name must be 34 characters or less
State name must be 30 characters or less
Postal code must be 10 characters or less

validation.exactlyTwoChars: Country code must be exactly 2 characters

jobTitle.label: Job title
jobTitle.description: Your current position in the organization
jobTitle.tooltip: Should match your business registration documents job title

validation.minLength: Job title must be at least 2 characters
validation.maxLength: Job title must be at most 50 characters
validation.pattern: Job title can only contain letters, numbers, and basic punctuation
validation.noLeadingSpace: Job title cannot start with a space
validation.noTrailingSpace: Job title cannot end with a space

firstName.label: Legal First name
firstName.description: Legal first name as it appears on government ID

validation.minLength: First name must be at least 2 characters
validation.maxLength: First name must be at most 30 characters
validation.pattern: First name can only contain letters, hyphens, apostrophes, and spaces

middleName.label: Legal Middle name
middleName.description: Legal middle name as it appears on government ID

validation.maxLength: Middle name must be at most 30 characters
validation.pattern: Middle name can only contain letters, hyphens, apostrophes, and spaces

lastName.label: Legal Last name
lastName.description: Legal last name as it appears on government ID

validation.minLength: Last name must be at least 2 characters
validation.maxLength: Last name must be at most 30 characters
validation.pattern: Last name can only contain letters, hyphens, apostrophes, and spaces

nameSuffix.label: Suffix
nameSuffix.description: Legal name suffix as it appears on government ID (e.g., Jr., Sr., III)
nameSuffix.tooltip: Common suffixes: Jr., Sr., II, III, IV

validation.minLength: Suffix must be at least 1 character
validation.maxLength: Suffix must be at most 5 characters
validation.pattern: Suffix can only contain letters, periods, and roman numerals

birthDate.label: Date of birth
birthDate.description: Date of birth as it appears on government ID

validation.future: Date of birth cannot be in the future
validation.tooOld: Date of birth indicates age over 120 years
validation.tooYoung: Must be at least 18 years old

natureOfOwnership.label: Nature of ownership
natureOfOwnership.description: How you own or control the organization

soleOwner.description: Whether you are the sole owner of the organization

title: Client Onboarding
initialStepDescription1: The information we request from you will help us complete setting up your account.
initialStepDescription2: Please review and update any information that needs confirmation; and provide any additional information requested.
initialStepNoOrganizationType: Please select your organization type to preview the information you will need to confirm or provide.
initialStepOrganizationTypeInformation: As a $t(organizationTypes.{{organizationType}}) using {{product}} in {{jurisdiction}}, you will need to confirm or provide the following information:
initialStepOrganizationTypeInformationBa: As a $t(organizationTypes.{{organizationType}}), you will need to confirm or provide the following information:
initialStepOrganizationTypeInformationFu: As a $t(organizationTypes.{{organizationType}}) using {{product}} in {{jurisdiction}}, you will need to confirm or provide the following information:
beneficialOwnerDialogDescriptionEdit: Make changes to beneficial owner information here. Click save when you're done.
beneficialOwnerDialogDescriptionAdd: Fill out the information for the new beneficial owner here. Click save when you're done.

errorMessages.default: An error occurred while fetching client data. Please try again.
errorMessages.clientNotFound: Client not found. Please try again or contact support.

initialStepNotes.title: Important Notes
initialStepNotes.additionalQuestions: Additional questions may be required based on your provided information
initialStepNotes.llcOwners: As an LLC, you will be able to add additional beneficial owners
initialStepNotes.attestation: You will need to review and attest to the accuracy of all provided information
initialStepNotes.kycProcess: Identity verification (KYC) process will be required for all controlling parties
initialStepNotes.termsAndConditions: You will need to review and accept the Terms & Conditions
